components.name: <uik-alert>
components.summary: Inline status messaging for neutral and semantic feedback.
a11y: role="status" by default; warning/danger switches to role="alert".

components.name: <uik-badge>
components.summary: Compact label for status or counts.
a11y: Inline element; provide meaningful text content.

components.name: <uik-box>
components.summary: Simple padded container with background and border hooks.
a11y: Presentational wrapper; use semantic HTML inside.

components.name: <uik-button>
components.summary: Primary action control with variants and sizes.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: solid | danger | outline | secondary | ghost | link

events.name: Native button events bubble from the internal <button>.

a11y: Forward aria-label, aria-labelledby, aria-describedby, aria-pressed, aria-haspopup, aria-expanded, and aria-controls to the internal button.
Roles remain on the host for Shadow DOM parentage-sensitive patterns (menus/menubars).
Icon-only buttons should provide an accessible name.

components.name: <uik-checkbox>
components.summary: Form-associated checkbox control with label, hint, and error slots.

events.name: Native change bubbles from the internal <input>.

a11y: Provide a label slot or aria-label; hint/error are wired via aria-describedby.

components.name: <uik-code-block>
components.summary: Read-only code block with optional copy action.

components.name: <uik-combobox>
components.summary: Combobox with input + listbox popup.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-combobox-base-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, border, fg, padding, radius, shadow

a11y: Input uses role="combobox" with aria-controls + aria-activedescendant.

components.name: <uik-command-palette>
components.summary: Command palette overlay with filtering, keyboard navigation, and selection.
a11y: Uses combobox + listbox with aria-activedescendant for keyboard navigation.

components.name: <uik-description-list>
components.summary: Definition list wrapper for label/value metadata.
a11y: Use dt/dd pairs for correct definition list semantics.

components.name: <uik-dialog>
components.summary: Native dialog wrapper with slots for title, description, and actions.

events.name: Native close and cancel bubble from <dialog>.

a11y: Uses native dialog semantics; forwards aria-* attributes to <dialog>.
Escape closes and overlay-close reports reason; focus returns to the opener.

components.name: <uik-heading>
components.summary: Tokenized heading typography with semantic levels.

attributes.name: tone
attributes.description: default | strong | muted | danger | success | warning | info

a11y: Renders the matching native heading element.

components.name: <uik-icon>
components.summary: Sized icon wrapper for inline SVG content.

attributes.name: tone
attributes.description: default | muted | danger | success | warning | info | inverse

a11y: Use aria-label for meaningful icons; icons are aria-hidden by default when unlabeled.

components.name: <uik-input>
components.summary: Form-associated text input with labels, hints, and errors.

events.name: Native input and change bubble from the internal <input>.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-input-base-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, border, fg, padding, radius, shadow, selection

a11y: Label slot associates via for; hint and error are wired to aria-describedby.
aria-invalid is set when invalid or error content is present.

components.name: <uik-json-diff>
components.summary: Token-driven JSON diff preview for apply flows.
a11y: Roving focus list. Arrow keys move, Left/Right collapse/expand, Enter/Space toggles.

components.name: <uik-json-viewer>
components.summary: Token-driven JSON viewer for structured data.
a11y: Tree role with roving focus. Arrow keys move, Left/Right collapse/expand, Enter/Space toggles.
notes: Copy shortcuts: Ctrl/Cmd+C copies value, Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+C copies path.

components.name: <uik-link>
components.summary: Anchor wrapper with tokenized colors and underline styling.

events.name: Native anchor events bubble from the internal <a>.

a11y: Forward aria-* attributes to <a>.

components.name: <uik-listbox>
components.summary: Listbox selection container with roving focus support.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-listbox-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, border, radius, padding, shadow

a11y: Roving focus with Arrow/Home/End; Enter/Space selects the focused option.

components.name: <uik-menu>
components.summary: Menu panel with trigger slot and roving focus items.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-menu-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, border, radius, padding, shadow, offset, gap

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-menu-item-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, padding, radius, height, state colors

a11y: Roving focus with Arrow/Home/End; Enter/Space selects; Escape closes and returns focus.

components.name: <uik-menu-item>
components.summary: Menu item for use inside uik-menu.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-menu-item-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, padding, radius, height, state colors

components.name: <uik-menubar>
components.summary: Menubar wrapper for uik-menu triggers.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-menubar-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, border, radius, padding, gap

a11y: Roving focus across triggers with ArrowLeft/Right, Home/End; ArrowDown opens.

components.name: <uik-nav>
components.summary: Navigation list with grouped links and current state.
a11y: Renders anchors inside a nav landmark; active links expose aria-current.

components.name: <uik-nav-rail>
components.summary: Navigation rail with roving focus and icon buttons.
a11y: Toolbar role with roving focus; Arrow/Home/End move focus; Enter/Space activate items.

components.name: <uik-option>
components.summary: Listbox option for use inside uik-listbox.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-listbox-item-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, fg, padding, radius, height, state colors

components.name: <uik-pagination>
components.summary: Pagination control with previous/next and page buttons.
a11y: Buttons are native and expose aria-current on the active page.

components.name: <uik-popover>
components.summary: Popover panel with trigger slot and optional native popover support.

events.name: Trigger events bubble; panel listens to native popover toggle when supported.

a11y: Forward aria-* attributes to the panel.

components.name: <uik-progress>
components.summary: Progress indicator with determinate and indeterminate modes.
a11y: Forward aria-label and aria-labelledby to the internal <progress>.

components.name: <uik-radio>
components.summary: Form-associated radio control with label, hint, and error slots.

events.name: Native change bubbles from the internal <input>.

a11y: Provide a label slot or aria-label; hint/error are wired via aria-describedby.

components.name: <uik-radio-group>
components.summary: Radio group wrapper with keyboard arrow navigation.

events.name: Native change bubbles from child radios.

a11y: Label slot wires aria-labelledby; hint/error are announced via aria-describedby.

components.name: <uik-resizable-panels>
components.summary: Resizable two-panel layout with a keyboard-accessible separator.
a11y: Handle uses role="separator" with keyboard resizing; defaults aria-label to "Resize panels" unless aria-label/aria-labelledby is set.

components.name: <uik-select>
components.summary: Form-associated select with label, hint, and error slots.

events.name: Native change bubbles from the internal <select>.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-select-base-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, border, fg, padding, radius, shadow, font

a11y: Provide a label slot or aria-label; hint/error are wired via aria-describedby.

components.name: <uik-separator>
components.summary: Horizontal or vertical separator line.
a11y: Horizontal renders <hr>; vertical uses role="separator".

components.name: <uik-spinner>
components.summary: Loading spinner with tone and size variations.

attributes.name: tone
attributes.description: default | muted | primary | danger | success | warning | info

a11y: Add aria-label if the spinner is meaningful.

components.name: <uik-stack>
components.summary: Flex stack for layout spacing and alignment.
a11y: Use semantic wrappers for landmark content.

components.name: <uik-surface>
components.summary: Surface wrapper for background, border, and elevation tokens.
a11y: Use semantic HTML inside; does not add roles.

components.name: <uik-switch>
components.summary: Form-associated switch control with label, hint, and error slots.

events.name: Native change bubbles from the internal <input>.

a11y: Uses role="switch" and supports label slot or aria-label.

components.name: <uik-tab>
components.summary: Tab element for use inside uik-tabs.

components.name: <uik-tab-panel>
components.summary: Tab panel for use inside uik-tabs.

components.name: <uik-tabs>
components.summary: Tabs container with roving focus and panels.
a11y: Arrow keys move focus; Enter/Space activate when activation=manual.

components.name: <uik-tag-input>
components.summary: Token-driven tag input control with add/remove keyboard support.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-tag-input-base-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, border, fg, padding, radius, shadow, focus ring

a11y: Input remains the primary focus target; ArrowLeft/Right moves between tags; Enter adds; Backspace/Delete removes.

components.name: <uik-text>
components.summary: Tokenized text wrapper for size, weight, tone, and truncation.
a11y: Use as=label for form labels when needed.

components.name: <uik-textarea>
components.summary: Form-associated textarea with label, hint, and error slots.

events.name: Native input and change bubble from the internal <textarea>.

cssCustomProperties.name: --uik-component-textarea-base-*
cssCustomProperties.description: bg, border, fg, padding, radius, shadow, min-height

a11y: Provide a label slot or aria-label; hint/error are wired via aria-describedby.

components.name: <uik-tooltip>
components.summary: Tooltip panel with trigger slot.

events.name: Trigger events bubble from slotted trigger.

a11y: Panel uses role="tooltip" and wires aria-describedby to trigger.

components.name: <uik-tree-view>
components.summary: Tree view navigation list with expandable branches.
a11y: Treeview role with roving focus; Arrow keys move, typeahead jumps, Enter/Space activates.
notes: Typeahead: typing letters moves focus to the next matching label.
Multi-select patterns are app-owned; compose selection controls alongside items.
Async loading: listen to tree-view-toggle or tree-view-activate and update items/openIds when children load.

components.name: <uik-visually-hidden>
components.summary: Utility to hide content visually while keeping it accessible.
a11y: Use for screen-reader-only labels or descriptions.

components.name: <uik-shell-activity-bar>
components.summary: Vertical activity bar composed with uik-nav-rail.
a11y: Delegates roving focus behavior to uik-nav-rail; provide aria-label/aria-labelledby on the host to name the rail (and any parent shell landmark).

components.name: <uik-shell-layout>
components.summary: Shell region layout container with named slots.
a11y: Provides top-level landmarks (main/complementary/contentinfo); label slotted regions via aria-label/aria-labelledby or heading on the slotted elements.

components.name: <uik-shell-secondary-sidebar>
components.summary: Secondary sidebar panel with header and optional footer.
a11y: Escape closes and returns focus (configured target or last active); close button is labeled; provide meaningful heading and host label when used in layout landmarks.

components.name: <uik-shell-sidebar>
components.summary: Primary sidebar with heading, actions, body, and footer slots.
a11y: Structural container for navigation content; provide labels on the host when used with layout landmarks.

components.name: <uik-shell-status-bar>
components.summary: Status bar for global status and actions.
a11y: Use short status text; provide accessible names for actions.

components.name: <uik-empty-state>
components.summary: Composed empty state pattern built from primitives.

components.name: <uik-example>
components.summary: Preview + code example pattern.

slots.name: controls
slots.description: Optional variant controls (e.g. uik-tabs or uik-select).

components.name: <uik-page-hero>
components.summary: Page hero pattern with content and optional control panel.

components.name: <uik-section-card>
components.summary: Section card pattern for grouping related content.
